name: DisplayEntityHelper
description: Specialized wrapper for Minecraft display entities providing access to properties such as transformation, rendering settings, brightness, and visual effects.
overview: The `DisplayEntityHelper` class is a specialized wrapper for Minecraft display entities (introduced in 1.19.4). It serves as the base class for all display entity helpers and offers comprehensive methods for querying display entity information, positioning, interpolation states, and rendering properties. Display entities are typically obtained through entity-related events, world queries, or when specifically filtering for display entity types.

methods.name: getLerpTargetX
methods.description: Gets the target X coordinate for the entity's interpolation.

methods.name: getLerpTargetY
methods.description: Gets the target Y coordinate for the entity's interpolation.

methods.name: getLerpTargetZ
methods.description: Gets the target Z coordinate for the entity's interpolation.

methods.name: getLerpTargetPitch
methods.description: Gets the target pitch rotation for the entity's interpolation.

methods.name: getLerpTargetYaw
methods.description: Gets the target yaw rotation for the entity's interpolation.

parameters.name: partialTick
parameters.description: The partial tick value (usually 1.0 for scripts)

methods.name: getBillboardMode
methods.description: Gets the billboard render mode of the display entity.

methods.name: getVisibilityBoundingBox
methods.description: Gets the bounding box used for visibility checks.

methods.name: getViewRange
methods.description: Gets the view range of the display entity.

methods.name: getDisplayWidth
methods.description: Gets the width of the display.

methods.name: getDisplayHeight
methods.description: Gets the height of the display.

methods.name: getBrightness
methods.description: Gets the overall brightness override for the entity.

methods.name: getSkyBrightness
methods.description: Gets the sky light brightness component.

methods.name: getBlockBrightness
methods.description: Gets the block light brightness component.

methods.name: getShadowRadius
methods.description: Gets the radius of the shadow cast by the entity.

methods.name: getShadowStrength
methods.description: Gets the strength/opacity of the shadow cast by the entity.

methods.name: getGlowColorOverride
methods.description: Gets the glow color override for the entity.
